title: 7-Day Weight Loss Plan
description: A balanced 7-day meal plan designed for healthy weight loss with nutrient-dense foods and controlled calorie intake.

breakfast.name: Oatmeal with Berries
breakfast.description: A bowl of steel-cut oats topped with fresh blueberries and strawberries

lunch.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
lunch.description: Mixed greens with grilled chicken breast, cherry tomatoes, and light vinaigrette

dinner.name: Baked Salmon with Vegetables
dinner.description: Oven-baked salmon fillet with roasted broccoli and sweet potato

snacks.name: Greek Yogurt with Nuts
snacks.description: Plain Greek yogurt with a handful of almonds

title: Muscle Gain Athletic Plan
description: High-protein meal plan designed for athletes and individuals looking to build muscle mass.

breakfast.description: Whole grain pancakes with scrambled eggs and turkey bacon

lunch.name: Beef and Quinoa Bowl
lunch.description: Lean beef strips with quinoa, black beans, and mixed vegetables

dinner.name: Grilled Chicken with Rice
dinner.description: Large grilled chicken breast with brown rice and steamed vegetables

snacks.name: Protein Shake
snacks.description: Whey protein shake with banana and peanut butter

snacks.name: Trail Mix
snacks.description: Mixed nuts, dried fruits, and dark chocolate

title: Diabetic-Friendly Meal Plan
description: Low glycemic index meal plan designed to help manage blood sugar levels effectively.

breakfast.name: Whole Grain Toast with Avocado
breakfast.description: Whole grain bread with mashed avocado and poached eggs

lunch.name: Lentil Soup with Salad
lunch.description: Hearty lentil soup served with a side of mixed green salad

dinner.name: Baked Cod with Quinoa
dinner.description: Baked cod fillet with quinoa and roasted asparagus

snacks.name: Apple with Almond Butter
snacks.description: Fresh apple slices with a tablespoon of almond butter

snacks.name: Greek Yogurt
snacks.description: Plain Greek yogurt with a few berries

dinner.description: Bell peppers stuffed with quinoa, black beans, and vegetables

snacks.name: Hummus with Vegetables
snacks.description: Fresh hummus with carrot sticks and cucumber

snacks.name: Mixed Nuts

title: General Healthy Eating Plan
